form.phoneRequired: The Phone Number field is required.
form.phoneNumeric: The Phone Number field must contain only numbers.
form.phoneMin: The Phone Number field must be at least 4 characters in length.
form.phoneMax: The Phone Number field cannot exceed 14 characters in length.
form.countryCodeRequired: The Country Code field is required.
form.countryCodeNumeric: The Country Code field must contain only numbers.
form.codeNumeric: The Code field must contain only numbers.

error.try: An error occurred while sending data, Please try again.
error.tokenExpired: Time expired - Please restart verification process
error.sessionExpired: The session has expired, please start again

text.pageTitle: Websites and Apps will not receive any of your personal information.
text.pageTitleApp: {APPNAME} will not receive any of your personal information.
text.phone: Your phone number is deleted after verification
text.privacy: Learn more about our mission to restore privacy.
text.continue: You will now be redirected completely anonymously to {APPNAME}.
text.timer: You will be brought back to {APPNAME} in {TIMER} seconds
text.verifyCode: Please enter the 4 digit code you received as SMS to +{COUNTRYCODE} {PHONE}.
text.afterSuccessful: After successful verification, your number will be deleted permanently. Only a random identifier will be stored.
